choices:

questions.question: What must you do after creating an element to display it?
questions.explanation: Adds it to the DOM tree.

questions.question: How do you delete an element from the DOM?
questions.explanation: Removes that element completely from the document.

questions.question: What happens if you add an event listener to a dynamically created element?
choices: It works just like any other element
It must be attached before creation
questions.explanation: Event listeners can be attached after creation.

questions.question: Why use trim() on input text?
choices: Removes extra spaces from both ends
questions.explanation: Ensures you don't add empty tasks accidentally.
